posts.post_content:
Hello All!

I have just bought ~50 T205s!  Although I will be sending many off to be graded; I didn’t think that it would be worth grading the following:  (All prices are “Net to Me” and include shipping.)

ALL cards are Piedmont Factory 25 backs, unless noted.  I don’t think that ANY of the cards are trimmed, but please check out the scans and use your own judgement.  I would be happy to answer your questions or provide additional scans if you want them.

KNIGHT (Honest Long Cut) – $15.00 - SOLD
OLDRING – $15.00 - SOLD 
SNODGRASS – [STRIKE]$15.00[/STRIKE] - SOLD
TANNEHILL – $15.00 - SOLD
WILSON – [STRIKE]$15.00[/STRIKE] - SOLD


AUSTIN – [STRIKE]$40[/STRIKE], GREAT-LOOKING card, a little bit of paper loss on reverse. - SOLD
BRESNAHAN (Closed) – [STRIKE]$45[/STRIKE], tack hole - SOLD!
GIBSON – [STRIKE]$28[/STRIKE] SOLD!
LOBERT – [STRIKE]$32[/STRIKE] SOLD!
McGRAW – [STRIKE]$50[/STRIKE] - SOLD!
NEEDHAM – “Flame-Kissed” – [STRIKE]$25[/STRIKE] – SAD, as this card would have been REALLY nice, crease-free. - SOLD!
PHILLIPPE (Hassan 649) – [STRIKE]$45[/STRIKE] a little bit of paper loss on reverse. - [STRIKE]$35[/STRIKE]  SOLD

Please message me if you are interested.  I will sell these cards in the order that I receive your requests. "A commitment to buy takes precedence over ongoing negotiations.”  (I stole that phraseology from someone, but I DO like it!)

PayPal – Friends or Family is preferred, please OR “Regular” PayPal + 3%!


Thank you for your consideration!
